message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can always adjust if you're not happy.
Your offer was a bit one-sided, Alice.  How about we split it a little more evenly?  This offer still gives you a slight advantage.
Let's be fair, Bob. This round, I propose we split the money evenly. It's a fair deal, and we can both get something before the inflation eats away at the value too much.
